/** @format */ import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Button, IconButton, TextField, Checkbox, Grid, FormControlLabel, Tab, Paper, Box, } from "@mui/material"; import { TabList, TabContext, TabPanel } from "@mui/lab"; import { useToggle } from "../../context/useToggle"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import KeyboardArrowRightIcon from "@mui/icons-material/KeyboardArrowRight"; // import { get_profile, update_profile } from "../../actions/profile"; const Profile = ({ user, profile }) => { const [open, setOpen] = useToggle(false); const [value, setValue] = React.useState("1"); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: "", password: "", }); const { email, password } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // login(email, password); }; const handleChange = (event, newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; return ( } label="Willing to locate" labelPlacement="start" defaultValue={profile.locate} /> } label="Search Type (Active/ Passiv)" labelPlacement="start" defaultValue={profile.search_active} />



); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ // isAuthenticated: state.auth.isAuthenticated, user: state.auth.user, profile: state.auth.profile, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Profile);
